H0.text: who was the leader of the us during wwii. Franklin D. Roosevelt

H1.text: who was the leader of the us during wwii. Harry S. Truman

H2.text: who was the leader of the us during wwii. Dwight D. Eisenhower

H3.text: who was the leader of the us during wwii. Gerald Ford

A4.text: Roosevelt supervised the mobilization of the American economy to support the war effort and implemented a Europe first strategy.

A5.text: Roosevelt won reelection in 1944, but died in 1945 after his physical health seriously and steadily declined during the war years.
